Description: Do not put safety messages inside <note>
qaReviewed must be true or false
If ITAR present ensure export metadata
If EAR present ensure export metadata
issueType=deleted must have no residual content
ACT references must not be empty
<effectivity> must contain condition or S/N range
Negated applicability should reference ACT key
Do not nest <warning>/<caution> inside each other
Prefer figures at step level not inside stepPara
Every <fiDecision> has both fiYes and fiNo

ObjectPath: //test[not(contains(. 'accept') or contains(. 'criteria') or contains(. 'pass') or contains(. 'fail'))]

Description: No empty list items in FI
Allowed image formats: svg png cgm
ObjectPath: //graphic[@xlink:href and not(ends-with(@xlink:href '.svg') or ends-with(@xlink:href '.png') or ends-with(@xlink:href '.cgm'))]

Description: Prefer https over http in figure links
No DRAFT watermarks in released figures
Allowed UOM: EA M MM IN KG NM LBF-FT DEG-C
manufacturerCode must be from approved list
IPD figure must reference an ICN
IPD callout must have a number

ObjectPath: //@xlink:href[not(starts-with(. 'http://') or starts-with(. 'https://') or starts-with(. 'mailto:') or starts-with(. 'file:'))]

Description: External pubs should include doc number/type

ObjectPath: //*[contains(. ' very ') or contains(. ' really ') or contains(. ' quite ')]

Description: Do not nest safety inside notes
Prefer direct imperatives over ensure that
If hydrogen/H2 mentioned verify safety warnings
If cryogenic mentioned verify PPE/handling steps
If high voltage/HV mentioned verify LOTO references
ObjectPath: //*[(contains(. 'high voltage') or contains(. 'HV')) and not(contains(. 'LOTO') or contains(. 'lockout'))]

Description: UTCS anchor present; CI cross-checks format
